ns2:test-suite.name: As a flipkart user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application with empty username credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with empty username credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username as ""
step.title: When I enter username as ""

step.name: And I enter password as "Innovate@123"
step.title: And I enter password as "Innovate@123"

step.name: And I click on login button
step.title: And I click on login button

step.name: Then I should see warning as enter valid cred "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"
step.title: Then I should see warning as enter valid cred "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application with empty username credentials

label.name: feature
label.value: As a flipkart user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application with valid credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with valid credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username as "9944402019"
step.title: When I enter username as "9944402019"

step.name: And I enter password as "Innovate@123"
step.title: And I enter password as "Innovate@123"

step.name: And I click on login button
step.title: And I click on login button

step.name: Then I should see user "Praveen"
step.title: Then I should see user "Praveen"

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application with valid credentials

label.name: feature
label.value: As a flipkart user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application with invalid username credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with invalid username credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username as "994"
step.title: When I enter username as "994"

step.title: And I enter password as "Innovate@123"

step.name: And I click on login button
step.title: And I click on login button

step.title: Then I should see warning as "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"

label.name: story

label.name: feature

test-case.name: Login into the application with wrong password credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with wrong password credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username as "9944402019"
step.title: When I enter username as "9944402019"

step.name: And I enter password as "sgddj"
step.title: And I enter password as "sgddj"

step.name: And I click on login button
step.title: And I click on login button

step.name: Then I should see warning as "Your username or password is incorrect"
step.title: Then I should see warning as "Your username or password is incorrect"

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application with wrong password credentials

label.name: feature
label.value: As a flipkart user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application with empty password credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with empty password credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.flipkart.com/"

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username as "9944402019"
step.title: When I enter username as "9944402019"

step.name: And I enter password as ""
step.title: And I enter password as ""

step.name: And I click on login button
step.title: And I click on login button

step.name: Then I should see password warning as "Please enter Password"
step.title: Then I should see password warning as "Please enter Password"
